1.content:
It's the year 2042. Life is dull and plain, all anyone ever does is work and the few moments of free time people get are spent quietly alone and without human contact. There are few moments of joy in this bleak future, so let's change all that with a small unsuspecting coffee shop.

But before we begin our tale, we must first choose our character we wish to follow.

Please, enjoy your day in someone else's shoes.

We will follow...
1.title: Beginnings.

choices: Some weird ad on the ground.
11.content:
"So where are you working now, Aaron?" I asked while taking a seat on top of the book he was reading. "What's the big secret about it?"

Aaron was a pretty well built guy, in fact if sports were still around he'd probably have been on a football team. His red hair was kept shaven and his facial hair neatly cleaned which added to the blandness of the black and white suit all students were expected to wear. The only noticeable difference between him and another male student was the pale yellow neck tie, students were permitted to wear their own neckties and not the plain uniform black ones given to them.

"I told you, man, I can't talk about it. Especially not in school."

"Why? Is it illegal?" I smirked, eyeing the robotic teacher at the front of the class that was programmed to monitor everyone in the room.

"No!"

"Then what's the problem?"

"Just-"

"Attention male students: Eric Vandervale, Aaron Shywater. Volume levels in this perimeter have exceeded general ambiance levels. Reframe from creating obstructive distractions. Be advised: failure to comply will result in expulsion from class and two demerits on your respective student records." Announced a mechanical voice from the front of the room.

"Great..." muttered Aaron, hiding his usual beet red face behind his book. I just rolled my eyes. We knew we both could afford another two demerits on our student records, but I decided to drop it.

Since last week, when Aaron had gotten his supposed job, he had been extremely quiet around me. Normally we would always hang with each other after class and find some way to cause trouble to entertain ourselves. After he had been hired though, he rarely even had time to speak. He always said he was "busy working", though he never did go into much detail after that.

I had made it my mission to discover where it was he was working so I could hang out with him more, Aaron seemed to think I was doing it to pester him though. But really it was because I was concerned about the line of work he might be doing. He was the only guy I had as a friend, most of the other "male students" as the robotic faculty called us hated my guts because I was a womanizer and was the crush of many girls in our class.

I should probably have given a brief introduction to myself though. My name is Eric Vandervale. I'm currently in my sixteenth year of schooling here in 0028 Institute, meaning I'd be a junior in high school if I translated it to pre-jump times. 0028 isn't a random number, it's a ranking. The school is the twenty eighth best institute for high learning, according to the government. It's pretty high up there, considering the numbers go into four digits. My family was part of the more influence members in the corporations when the technology jump happened, so we're very well off and were able to get me into this school. Though I'm considered somewhat on the thick side by my parents, both my brothers had gone to 0002 and 0004 schools respectively while I never cared much for school.

"Perfect," whispered Aaron. "Eric, can you spare a pen?"

I waited for the robotic teacher to scan in another direction before tossing Aaron one of my spare pens. Aaron was a good guy, if shy. He was certainly a lot smarter than me, but he'd never admit it. His biggest fault was that he was always a perfectionist, meaning he'd spend hours working on one math problem until he got it spot on even if he'd never get to the others in time to complete a test. Unlike my family, Aaron came from a generally poor family that struggled to even keep him here which was why I was somewhat relieved to hear he had found a job after school.

As I fiddled around with my other pens while Aaron continued to take notes, what sounded like an air raid alarm rang out in the halls outside the classroom. The usual mechanical voice of the robot teacher blared out.

"Time period 'Study Hall' concluded. Students are required to vacant the room. The Board of Education seeks to remind students that any illegal activity after school hours that may deface the reputation of the Institute will-"

But the poor robot was quickly overwhelmed by the sudden rush of students trying to push their way to the door to escape the dank dark cell of a room. I tried to keep my eye on Aaron as we made our way to our lockers. It was usually during this after school rush that I lost him while he made his way to work. This time I tried my best to keep an eye on his shaven red head but eventually lost it under the crowd of similarly shaven heads.

"God dammit..." I muttered, kicking my locker when I came to it.

I didn't think Aaron would have the guts to do something really illegal for a job, no matter how desperate his family was for money. He knew he could always ask me for help after all. But he certainly was hiding something and his behavior was only getting more awkward by the day.

As I threw my bag into the locker, I slammed it shut not caring if it locked or not. I then headed outside to go home.

Though the bus was still there and loading up with other students, I figured spending a few hours cramped in a flying metal tin can would not be the best thing to improve my mood. The weather seemed to be reflecting my attitude, clouds and darkness matched the unvarying skyscrapers as flying cars buzzed around the tops like a swarm of bees. A walk through the lower city might help clear my anger.

That's when I saw...
11.title: A friend's new job.

111.content:
...Aaron, in one of the glass elevators on the side of the skyscraper across the flyway. I almost started to run towards it before thinking about the flying cars screeching past at every altitude, including ground level. If I hadn't glanced behind me at exactly the right moment, I would never have seen him. Aaron must have gone out the front of the institute with the crowd and doubled around to the back. I had thought he was acting suspicious before, but now I was convinced. He knows nobody goes out of the school that way - everybody knows that. There's a no-fly zone around most of the school, and even then, most flying cars are up so high that they're not a danger to anyone. The 0028 institute, though, is pushed right up against the access flyway of the industrial zone next door, and flying cars are crammed in it at every level all day until the zone shuts down at night. I was getting very confused as I put two and two together. It was already evening, and the zone was shutting down soon - so what business did Aaron in there? On top of that, he's still a student, so I know he's not certified to do any industrial labor at all.

As all these things were running through my head, the elevator he was in began moving... down? No building has basements anymore. The radiation levels only go up the further you go down. Now I was really worried - and Aaron was getting away!

"Excuse me - Sorry, I-" I immediately turned around and pushed against the crowd still pouring out of the Institute's imposing, featureless facade. Shaved heads passed on every side as I moved towards the speeding wall of flying cars, moving almost as fast as my racing thoughts. How was I going to get past that? It didn't look like there was a crosswalk tunnel anywhere. How did Aaron get through? Aaron! All I could see now is his head moving down with the elevator!

"Attention male student: Eric Vandervale. Speed levels in this perimeter have exceeded allowed courtyard speed. Refrain from running. Be advised: failure to comply will result in removal from campus and one demerit on your student records."

I whipped around to face the automated voice belonging to the robot campus security. I should have realized that moving against the crowd would have drawn it's attention to me, even without running.

"Okay! I'm slowing down!" I yelled, raising my arms. "I'm going slowly now. Fine."

Turning back to the flyway, I groaned in frustration: the lift was back in it's spot, devoid of Aaron. I walked, well below the campus speed limit I might add, to the edge of the flyway. Cars were still flying by at breakneck speed. Running might work if I could time it right, but if I didn't... I swallowed with a dry throat. It might be best just to walk home.

I decided to...
111.title: Where is he going?

choices: Leave. This is all too strange.
Go with her - this is exciting.
1111.content:
...go for it. I was pretty sure I could make it across. Up close, the traffic definitely had gaps in it large enough to run through as long as I timed them right. Aaron's behavior had been bugging me all week. I glanced up and down the flyway, shifting back and forth and getting in position to dash across. A gap was coming up soon. I pushed forward on one foot, and almost put my other foot in front - I saw the cars whiz by in my peripheral vision, and choked myself back. The wind rushed by over my scalp as the cars barreled past. I eyed the elevator across the road, and steeled myself again. I could see another gap in the traffic, bigger than the last one, and I wasn't going to miss it. Three... two...

"One!" I shouted as I lunged forward and squeezed my eyes shut - If I was going to die, I didn't want to see it.

I could taste the polluted air filling my lungs as I ran across, feel the scrunch of the hard flyway tarmac, until I could feel the ground was plain concrete again. I let myself collapse on the smooth ground, and I started to laugh a little at the crazy thing I had just done. That was not normal, and that was not something I should have done, but I felt exhilarated. It must be Aaron's behavior getting to me... something about Aaron lately had been different. Even though he wouldn't talk to me, he just seemed more... alive. Well, now, I though to myself as I looked purposefully at the elevator, I was going to find out. I got up and walked purposefully to the standard sliding glass door to the elevator. Strange... especially in an industrial zone like this, I would have expected it to have some form of biological identifier to keep unwanted visitors out. But, hey - If I wasn't unwanted, I was wanted! As I got closer, the door slid open for me, and I stepped inside. There was nothing unusual about the elevator so far; standard single light, blank gunmetal walls. The button panel, though, had only one button, with a symbol I didn't recognize.

☕

A... bowl? No, an... antique cup. One from the old days: a curved cup, with a round handle on the side - imagine - and three squiggly line coming from out from the top. Snakes?

I shrugged and pushed my finger firmly on the button, and the elevator began to move down. I watched quietly through the glass panel as the ground moved up, taking everything I knew with it. I was starting to think this wasn't a good idea. Who knew what was down here? The sidewalk ground was quickly replaced with the layer of radiation shields under the walk - metal, probably 20 feet thick this far into the ground. It would need to be, to protect everyone up top, at least from what I knew from history class. I shivered a bit. I hope the shields cover this underground structure, as well.

Suddenly, the elevator stopped, and the metal in front of the glass slid open. My first look at Aaron's place of work: brick walls? A wooden counter top for a front desk? I unconsciously let my mouth drop a little. I had only seen these things in the school datacentre's digital encyclopaedia. And behind the counter... My jaw finally dropped all the way open. There was a woman standing there with shoulder length hair - that is, much longer than the standard shaved heads I had seen all my life. It was dark, blackish, almost dark enough to be blue, with a gloss reflecting the warm light from the antique filament lightbulb. Then the glass separating me from this strange apparition slid open.

"Hello, Eric." She spoke with a voice that was easily comfortable and commanding at once.

I snapped my mouth shut. She gave a little sigh and shake of the head.

"Aaron said to look out for someone of your description, in case he was followed..." She narrowed her eyes by only a centimeter, and it was still terrifying. "You are Eric, aren't you?"

I nodded my head, maybe too quickly: "Yes - Vandervale. Eric... Vandervale."

"Good." She nodded her head slowly, relaxedly, and I watched as the steely menace smoothed out of her face in an instant, replaced with a calm, slight smile. She walked around the counter, and right up to the elevator, which made me very conscious of the fact that I hadn't moved an inch since I saw her.

"I'm Ann, by the way." She held out her hand with the fingers outstretched in a friendly manner.

I reached out and wrapped my hand around mine - and she unexpectedly pulled me closer, leaning in to speak in a low voice into my ear:

"You're going to have to decide, right now. If you go right back up that elevator, and never, ever come back, that'll be it. But if you decide to come see what we sell in here, you are..." She chuckled a bit to herself, and I couldn't tell whether to feel excited or afraid. "You are going to find yourself doing something here that you spend a large amount of your time doing. And when you're not here, you will be thinking about being here."

She leaned back, and stood with her piercing, strangely comforting eyes looking straight at mine. That small smile was back on her face, but her dress shoe was tapping slowly on the floor.

"So? What'll it be?"
1111.title: Run across to the elevator.

choices: Told me to drink a cup of coffee for the guests
11112.content:
I decided, perhaps against my better judgement, to follow this woman into her "coffee shop". I vaguely remembered my mom and dad talk about how they first met at one, long ago when that was still legal. I made a note to get out of here when school let out, so that it wouldn't make my parents suspicious. When we got to the main counter, Ann turned back towards me.
"Now, normally this kind of thing would cost some money, but I'm willing to make an exception for you, forever, if you decide to work here with your friend."
As if on cue, Aaron walked out, carrying what appeared to be a bag of black shells. He stopped dead in his tracks once he set it down and turned to face me.
"Eric! What... are you doing here... isn't there still school?" He stated rather meekly.
"Relax, Aaron, I was just offering your friend a job here, and all that entails. You know that we need the manpower to keep money rolling in. Besides, I sense a rebellious streak in this one, which is perfect for an establishment like this."
"Very well, I accept. So, tell me how this place works?"
"That," Ann replied, "would take too long, but let me just say that if you take a drink, you can become practically anyone you wish, and live for a bit in their shoes. You can get free coffee after hours, and serve drinks and keep order during operational hours. Don't worry about your parents, by the way, I will personally make sure that are fine with you being here. Other than that, your pay is determined by how much you sell. Also, I would like for you to start today. Is all of that clear?"
"yes, of course. So what would you have me do?" I responded, both stunned and impressed with how this business operated. After a moment of thought, Ann...
11112.title: Go with her - this is exciting.

choices: Open it and check what's inside
Put it away and check it out later.
12.content:
Amy Dawn was an ordinary student,in this ordinary and strict university.The 25 year old student was indeed sucessfull,she did nothng but study and work hard.It was the way of this world now.Ever since said goverment entered 10 years ago and banned everything she loved,she had to give up her dreams of becoming a manga artist (since every art form was now illegal.) and had to turn on studing to become a lawyer or teacher instead.Today was the last day of the school year and Amy finally retuned home,even though she had nothing to look forward to.
Once home,she found a letter near the door of her appartment.That was strange,since mail was now delivered by emial now.There were no more physical mail and letters.Amy grabbed the letter and went inside.Once she was inside the appartment she looked at the letterdecinding on what to do.
12.title: A female student.

121.content:
Amy opens the letter and reads it's contains.
"Congratualtions,this letter is a gift from our humble coffee shop."Amy was confused.She didn't enter any contest.And she wasn't visiting any coffee shops.She continued to read."Show this letter to Ann,at this adress:400 Moonlight street and receive a free drink on the house.
But you not talk to anyone about this prize and must come either alone or with people you can trust.This will change your life.
Looking forward to meet you before yo become the new you!
The staff of Someone's else shoes."
Amy was even more confused after reading the letter.New you? Someone else's shoes?Despite that,it sounded exiting.She picked her coat,and the letter and headed for the location.
----------------------------------------
Once there,Amy found the adress,but the stores in the area were closed ,for awhile.She hoped that it wasn't a sham.She was about to give up something odd on the location she was looking for,emerged from the ground.There was a control panel with the image of a coffee mug on a huge green button.Thinking that it might lead to what she was looking for,she pressed it,The door of one of the buildings opened.She went inside.As she searched in the deserted room,the door she entered closed behind her,and another one opened in front of her,revealing an elevator.She was abit hesistant at first,but decided to go forward.There was no turning back.She went inside the elevator,and pressed on the single button on it,The elevator went down.The doors opened to reveal the secret coffee shop Amy was looking for.It was only a counter,much to her disappointment.Fortunatly,there was someone behind it.She might answer her questions.
Amy stepped out of the elevator and toward the counter.
"Escuse me? Are you Ann?" she asked.
"That would be me." said the lady."Were you followed and how did you find this place?" she asked,suspecious.
Amy showed her the letter.Ann looked at it and smiled."You are one of the few who received it."
She didn't want to ask why and how.
Ann opened the door near the counter."Come in,I'll give you your coffee,after you drink it,I'll lead you to the mess hall.Amy was even more confused as she came it and looked around.The room behind the counter seemed ordinary,with a single table and a door at the back."Before I come back with your drink,I need to ask you a few questions."
"First if you wanted to become someone else,would it be someone you know,an animal or a fictional character?
121.title: Open it and check what's inside

1213.content: "If I would choose, maybe a fictional character." Amy replied. "Interesting." said Ann as she prepared the coffee."From what media?" she asked.
1213.title: Fictional character

12132.content:
"Video games?"
"Oh yes, video games. It was fun." Ann replied.
"Yeah but they are illegal now.. Amy added.
"Saddly,yes.But when they were still legal, what was your favorite series?" Amy thought about it.
12132.title: Video Games

121321.content:
"Final Fantasy."
"Awesome!" Ann chirped."I loved those games. Loved the seventh game. Cloud was my a favorite of mine, not only because he was cute or something." she added.
"Anyway,which game did you prefer?"
121321.title: Final Fantasy

1213211.content:
"Final Fantasy XV was my favorite game." said Amy.
"You mean the one with Noctis? He's kinda cute." Ann replied."He's your favorite character right?"
1213211.title: Final Fantasy XV

12133.content:
"Anime or manga.When it was still legal, I used to be a fan and wanted to become a mangaka...but it's now illiegal so.."
"Yeah I understand." said Ann."That must be hard, but which series did you enjoy?" she asked."How about....Naruto? That was my favorite.Ninjas with super powers and all!"
12133.title: Anime/manga

121331.content:
"Yeah me too!" said Amy "I liked Naruto." She then understood something."You want to know which character I would like to be if I could?" Amy asked.
"Yeah's that's about it." said Ann."Would it be male or female?"
121331.title: Naruto?

1213311.content:
Amy went red as she was about to answer."Maybe a character of the opposite gender.Most of my favorite characters are males."
"Which one? Naruto himself?" Ann asked.
1213311.title: Male character

12133112.content:
"He's awesome, but he's not my favorite." said Amy.
"How about Sasuke, his rival? He's rather cool,don't you think?" Ann asked,
12133112.title: Another character?

121331121.content:
"Yeah,Sasuke's cool." said Amy.
"Which version of him did you like?" Ann asked.
121331121.title: Sasuke?

choices: The new Sasuke seemed cool about his new self.
1213311211.content:
"Maybe part 1 Sasuke when he was still in Konoha." Amy replied.
"That's good." said Ann."Coffee is ready."
She hands Amy the cup."After you are done I'll lead you to the mess hall with the other guests."
Amy nodded and started to drink. As she drink the coffee Amy felt painless changes in her body.The first changes were her breast which started to melt under her shirt and felt something else appear between her legs.Her muscle structure changed.Her skin turned paler.Her pants turned into white shorts and a kunai holster materialised around her left leg.Her shoes turned into sandals.Her shirt turned blue with a large collar around her neck and a familiar red and white fan symbol on the back.
Amy suddently felt something cold on her forehead,as she felt something metalic.She now wears the familiar Konoha protector headband.Her head and face were the last to change.Her face changed into familiar masculine traits and her long brown hai turned black before those on the back turned shorter and spikier and the one on the fromt became shoulder length bangs.
Ann smiled."Do you feel different now?"
"Yeah." Amy replied.She, or her noticed that his voice was different..and familiar.
She hands a mirror to Amy...now Sasuke.
1213311211.title: Part 1

12133112112.content:
Amy,now Sasuke stares at his new self, which was a character that was until now, a fictional character, from his favorite manga."I'm Sasuke.That's cool" he said.
"You don't seem to be shocked about this." said Ann.
"It's not everyday that you get turned into your favorite character." said Sasuke."Good to know.Some customers before you were shocked and it took them alot of time to get used to their new selves."
"Was it the coffee?" Sasuke asked.Ann nodded."This is a special blend, that turns you into someone else.That's why it's called "Someone's else shoes."
Sasuke thought about it."Is it perminant?" he asked.
"It only lasts 24 hours." said Ann.
"Only that short time?" Sasuke asked.
"If you want to stay longer,maybe you can work here.You will get payed well, and get free coffee."
12133112112.title: The new Sasuke seemed cool about his new self.

121331121122.content:
.I'll think about it,. said Sasuke.
"Good." said Ann."One more thing before we head to the mess hall.There is some cases where the change is perminent.So if you decide to return home,I'll create a mask and suit of your former self,so you'll be able to hide your new identity." Ann added.
"Nothing to worry about then." Sasuke replied.
121331121122.title: "I'll think about it."

choices: One of his kids has cancer and has to be treated.
His company is about to go bankrupt.
13.content: What is our dear father stressing out about?
13.title: What a life!

14.content:
"Trafic again...go figure."
Nicole Carlson was a 39 year old single buisnesswoman,working for an insurance company..Every day was the same.She had to fill up contracts and bults on the computer,and be the "punching bag" of unhappy customers.And most of the time,she had to do over time.Tonight she finished her shift at 11h30 PM.
It's not like there was someone or something to look forward to waitng at home.Most of the hobbies she loved to do and enjoy 20 years ago have been declaired illegal ever since the new goverment had taken office.
But it was all about to change.
"Not again," Her flying car broke down again.It proceeded to land in an unknown corner of the city.One that Nicole dosen't know.She was thankful that her car add could land while on autopilot if it breaks down.
She landed near a elevator near a skyscrapper.Nicole got out of her car and went inside the elevator.Hoping there was a garage,or something else that could help her restore her car.She only had a few hours to sleep before she had to return to work for another stressful day.She noticed a familliar button on the elevator."A coffee mug?" she said.It was along time since it haven't seen one.Perharps it meant that it would lead to a coffeehouse.Good timing,perharps she could use their holo phone to call a mechanic who could repair her car.
She pushed the button.The elevator went down.
------------------------------------
As the elevator's doors opened,Nicole looked at the shop that was before her.It was indeed a coffeehouse,and a very nice one too.She noticed a young woman at the counter,
"Hello." Nicole asked the young woman."My car broke down nearby and I need to call for a mechanic and a pickup."
"I'm sorry." the young woman said."We don't have a phone here.But I'm sure you came here for something else."
"What do you mean?" Nicole asked,confused."I can see that you looked sad,stressed.Plus you don't seem to sleep alot." she added.

"Yeah,you got that right." Nicole replied.
"That got just what you need,that is,if you accept to follow me inside my coffeehouse and show you what we sell." said the young woman.Nicole thought about it.It was a coffeehouse after all. A good coffee would help her gain some energy.
"Very well." said Nicole."Lead the way."
The young woman opened the door to the exhausted business woman who came inside.
"My name is Ann by the way." said the young woman.
"I'm Nicole."
"That's good,but you don't need to tell me your real name since you'll need another one for the next 24 hours." Ann replied.
"What do you mean by that?" Nicole asked.
Ann handed a menu to Nicole.
Nicole thought that these were the coffee,teas and other drinks they served.She browsed through it and was confused at some of the themes.But one interested her in particular.
14.title: An overworked businesswoman.

143.content: One section of the menu was called "Fictional characters.It had drinks themed after famous movies,book,video games,cartoons and manga/anime.Nicole dedides to look at the drinks themed after...
143.title: Fictional characters

1431.content:
She settled for the Anime/manga themed section of the menu.It reminded her of her lost otaku cosplayer days when at the end of her teenage years.She loved to attend conventions and dress up as her favorite character.It all came to an end 10 years ago,when her former hobbies were now forbbbiden and illegal.
She dismissed the thought and looked at the drinks of the section.
1431.title: Anime/manga

14311.content:
"I think I'll take the Konoha bubble tea." Nicole ordered.Nicole used to be a fan of Naruto from her childhood up to the ban of pop culture.
"A very took choice." said Ann as she picked up the menu."My big sister was a fan of the Naruto manga too.Your order will be ready shortly." she added before to go back behind the counter.
She returned a few minutes later with a glass containing a blue liquid,black Jelly bubbles and ice.She handed over to Nicole."Let me give you a few words of advice when you start drinking this bubble tea." Ann told the business woman."Think about what was your favorite character from this comic."
Nicole looked at Ann in confusion,but dismissed the thought and started to drink.As instructed,she started to think about her favorite character..which used to be...
14311.title: Konoha bubble tea(Naruto)

choices: She leads Sasuke(Nicole) to the main hall of the coffeehouse.
143112.content:
"A very good choice indeed,continue to focus as enjoy this bubble tea." Ann added.
Nicole,still confused as she drinks the bubble tea,started to think.She searched in her mind until she remembered.Her favorite character was Sasuke Uchiha.He was a member of Naruto's Team 7,but he left the village to gain the power to defeat his brother Itachi...until he learned the truth about him.She was happy that Sasuke was reformed that the end of the manga.She liked him better as a good guy.She and her former group of friends cosplayed Naruto characters at conventions when she was 16.
She cosplayed as the teen version of Sasuke.Her thoughts were suddently interupted by a strange,but pleasant feeling inside of her body.She felt like her body was getting reshaped.Her muscle and bone structure was chaning.Her skin turned paler.
She felt her breasts melting under her shirt,and that something else appeared between her two legs.

She started to shrink and de-age,before starting to look like she was 17 years old.Her clothes started to change as wellShe felt holes forming in her shoes as they turned to sandals.Her work uniform was replaced by a familliar grey vest with the symbol of a white and red fan on the back,black pants,a blue skirt and a purple rope-like belt.
Finally,the final phase of the transformation reached her head and face.She felt a brief pain on her face as it was changing...looking younger and masculine..and forming familiar traits.Her hair turned black and started to get shorter.The hair on the back of her head spiked up while the ones at the front formed long bangs at each side of her face and on her forehead.
"Now...how do you feel?" Ann asked.
"I...feel...well.not like myself." Nicole replied.She just noticed that her voice just sounded deeper and younger...like her former favorite Naruto character.
"That's the point." said Ann as she handed a mirror to Nicole.
As she looked at her reflection,Nicole was shocked to see..,Sasuke Uchiha,looking like he was out of the Naruto manga,staring back at her..or rather..him.
"What..what was in this tea?" he asked.
"It's a special recipe." Ann started to explain."If you had payed attention at the entrance,you would have noticed the name of this coffeehouse:"Someone else's shoes.These drinks change you,for 24 hours into the person you wish to be...real or fictional...male or female..human or not.So for the next 24 hours,you are no longer Nicole Carlson,39 year old buisnesswoman ravaged by stress and tireness,you are Sasuke Uchiha,17 year old redeemed ninja of the Uchiha clan,wishing to rekindle bonds with his friends.
"And what do I do,in this form for the next 24 hours?" Sasuke asked.
"Come with me." said Ann.Sasuke followed the coffeehouse,s owner to a door in the back of the counter.
143112.title: Sasuke Uchiha

1431122.content:
Ann opened the door.Sasuke's new onyx eyes widened as he steps inside.Like the Doctor's Tardis(from Doctor Who) it looked bigger on the inside."Welcome to the main hall!The people and creatures you see are,like you,transformed customers.For the time you are in this form,you can enjoy the activities or make new friends and talk with the other customers." Ann explained."Howrever,there is a few house rules you need to repect."
"Which are?" Sasuke asked,raising an eyebrow.
"First,you must not leave the house while transformed.Wait until the effect of the coffee or tea wear off.Second,never ask about the other customers's true identities,or reveal yours,for the third one,I'll let you figure it out yourself pretty boy." Ann explain.
"Well,I'm not really a boy,not really Sasuke."
"You are now.So,have a good time! If you need anything else,just ask one of my employees." Ann added before t close the door and leave Sasuke on his own.
--------------------------
Sasuke looked around the huge room.There were a few coffee counters,but there was also two living rooms,a library,a gaming room,a gym(He wondered why there was a gym in a coffeehouse),and other fun areas.As for the other customers,he could regonise a few,even though he knew that it wasn't really their true forms.There was other fictional characters,from any media possible.There was also Historical figures and celebrities,even anthropomorphic animals.Not people in costumes,real furries.All of them looked happy.
This might have been the chance he was looking for.
"Maybe it's a good thing to be a character that was once my favorite." he said to himself."May the next 24 hours be the best."Sasuke went to explore the room,thinking about where to stop first.
1431122.title: She leads Sasuke(Nicole) to the main hall of th...

choices: An old man, on the verge of death.
15.content: Where does our focus lay?
15.title: Who to follow?

1522.content:
Since freedom has gone down the drain in the last ten years, an old forebidden practice has been allowed to come back: Slavery. Howrever, the human beings being chosen to be slaves didn't belong to a single race, but rather a single social class:
First:the less fortunate ones.In the last ten years, raises of prices and taxes and the basic salary dropping drove the middle class to extinction,leaving a gap between the rich and poor. The less fortunate ones, lost their homes and didn't have enought money to buy food. To gain food and shelter people of the less fortunate class have to be assigned to people of the rich class and work for them until the end of their lives.
Tabbitha was one of those new age slaves. The 20 year old young woman was in the service of a rich familly who threated her like she was trash.No matter how hard and how well she did her job,they always found an excuse to say she didn't do her job well and insult her.

But little did she know that her life would soon change.
One day, as Tabby came back from the market with the food she bought for her master, she got lost.
In an alley she found something on the wall of a nearby building: A button with the image of a coffee mug on it. Curious,she pressed on the button.
The wall opened,revealing an elevator.
1522.title: Female

choices: Refuses and goes back in the elevator
15221.content:
Tabby steps inside the elevator.The door closed and the elevator went down.
Once arrived in the basement,the door opened again,reavealed a path leading to a small coffee shop.Tabby went closer to tthe counter,dropping her bags.
Behind the counter, a young woman looked at her and smiled at her,"Welcome. to "Someone's else Shoes" " she said with a bright smile. "My name is Ann.Since it's your first time, I'll offer you a coffee on the house!"
15221.title: Go inside

152211.content:
"Why not.It's been awhile since someone offered me something." said Tabby.Ann smiled and led her behind the counter."Now as I'll prepare your coffee I'll ask you a few questions." she said as she started.
"If you would be someone else,would it be someone who exist or fictional?"
152211.title: Accepts

1522112.content:
"Fictional." Tabby replied."Heroes from my childhood's video games, comics TV shows ,cartoon and movies have much more exciting lives."
"I agree on that." said Ann."Until the gouverment illegalised all pop cultures."
"Yeah, I didn't understand that."
"Nevermind that,what of tthose media did you like the most?" Ann asked.
1522112.title: Fictional

15221121.content:
"I loved video games." said Tabby,"Until it became illegal and until my familly and I were seperated and each sent to be slaves."
"I'm sorry for you." said Ann"But I promise here you'll be free. Still on the subject of video games,what is your favorite series?"
15221121.title: Video Games

152211211.content:
"Final Fantasy." Tabby replied.
"Which one?" Ann asked.
152211211.title: Final Fantasy

1522112111.content:
"Final Fantasy XV.My sister Lucy and I loved this game. She looked down,thinking about her older sister,she used to get along with her.She hasn't seen her since she was sent to be a slave for that rich familly.
"Missing your sister? Maybe you'll meet her again,you never know." said Ann,as if she knew her sister came here.
"Yeah,my sister and I were as close as Noctis and Prompto."
"Cool!" said Ann."Which one of the two is your favorite?"
1522112111.title: Final Fantasy XV

choices: I think I'll have to get use to this....
15221121112.content:
"Out of the four Chocobros? I say it's Prompto. He's fun loving,carefree and loves photography! But he's abit sensible, like me." Tabby replied.
"Good to know." said Ann."Your coffee is ready!"
Ann gives a coffee cup to Tabby, She took it and smell the berverage.It smelled like cinnamon. Tabby took a sip. It wasn't to hot,so she continued to drink.
But as she drinked,her body and clothes started to change.
Her servant outfit changed into a black shelveless shirt with white patterns.A black vest with patches sewed on it and red cloth hanging underneith matterialised over her shoulders.Her pants changed and now had a leopard pattern on them
Her shoes turned into black boots with some red under the boots. Finger less gloves and armbands materialised over her hands and wrists,respectfully, and a black cloth was now tied around her right arm.
The changes now started to affect her body, as she continued to drink the coffee. Her feet grew,now fitting in her new boots.Her legs grew longer and gained a slight amount of muscles.She also felt like something was growing between her legs.Her hands broadened,fitting in those new gloves.Her arms grew longer and also gained a few muscles.Their were even freckles appearing on her arms,as her shoulders transformed, Her hips changed to fit her new male form.Her breasts deflated and disappeared.
She was now fully male. Her chest changed to fit her new male form.

She could feel something in her throat as her voice started to change. Her face transformed to become familiar male ones.More freckles appeared over her,no his noses.Her eyes turned from green to blue.

Finally,her brown hair was pulled on her skull until it became shorter.It spiked up,a few locks and bangs fell at each side of his new face while one was raised up.
He was done with the coffee."Yeah,that was good!" said Tabby, in an unsual cheerful tone and...a familiar male voice that wasn't his. .Wait a minute?.
He looked as himself. "Did I transform into..."
Ann smiled and handed a mirror to Tabby.

The former female slave was shocked when he saw his new reflextion. The one of Prompto Argentum, his favorite character,staring back at him. "What did you put in this coffee?!" he asked.

"A special blend." Ann replied."It's not called "Someone else's shoes for nothing.Here our coffees can turn you into someone you want to become, real or fictional." she explained.
"So,how do you feel?"
15221121112.title: Prompto?

choices: Follow Ann to the mess hall.
152211211121.content:
"How do I feel about this?" Prompto asked. "It's awesome! It's like cosplay,but at another level!"
"It's even better then cosplay. You are the character." Ann replied.
"Thanks alot mam! No more slaving! I'll be able to photograph alot of things! " Tabby,now Prompto replied cheerfully.
"But it's better if you do it indoors." Ann added."You cannot do it outiside in your transformed state. The law must not know of this place."
"Understood!" Prompto replied.
"You're adorable,even in real life." said Ann. "Guezz,thanks." Prompto replied,blushing.
"I almost forgot! I'll lead you to the mess hall.I think there's someone who was waiting for you." Ann said.
"Really?" Prompto asked cheerfully.
152211211121.title: It's awesome!

1522112111211.content:
Prompto followed Ann to mess hall, but as Ann opened the door,the mess hall was revealed to be multiple doors. Ann led Prompto to a door at the far right.
" That's your door." Ann said as she opened the door. Prompto looked though it.Through the other side.....was another coffee shop,one that actually had windows with sunlight passing through them. The shop also had a 60's retro look to it.Ann and Prompto went in the shop.
'Is that the mess hall?" Prompto asked. "One of many yes." Ann replied" And the one fitted to your current form."
Prompto looked outside.Near the shop was a gas station and a motel. Parked at the gas station was a familiar car. "Is that..the Regalia? Are we in Eos?"
"Gotta!" said Ann. "And I think I can hear that "someone waiting for you." coming.
The door opened,but what made Prompto react was the voice calling his name. A familiar voice. He turned and came face to face..with Noctis Lucis Caelum, prince of Lucis, protagonist of FFXV and Prompto's best friend.
Prompto coudn't know why but he felt like he knew Noct even before he became Prompto,and not because he was a video game character.
1522112111211.title: Follow Ann to the mess hall.

15221121112111.content:
"Hi...Noct!" Prompto replied.He had to stay in character. "Glad to find you at last." Noctis replied."We were looking for you you know."
"Yeah, I was....taking pictures!" Prompto replied."You didn't change buddy." Noctis with a smile."I see you met Ann." "Y..Yeah, she showed me around." Prompto replied."Go,your highness.You completed your hunt,right?" Ann asked. "Yeah,did it. That Behemoth didn't stand a chance!" Ann gave gills and four coffees to Noctis."For you and your three friends." she added with a smile. Noct turned to Prompto. "You're coming buddy?" "Sure thing Noct!" Prompto replied. This was the start of a new life for him. "Have fun!" said Ann as she headed th the backstore(which was really the front of the "Someone else's shoes coffee shop.
15221121112111.title: Talk to Noctis

choices: Pulling the wool over wide eyes...
Lysaila gifts male customers a try at being a Ram...
155.content:
The quaint tinkle of the spring held brass bell nailed to the shop front door tingles with every time a body enters the door to the coffee shop. As with every tinkling sound many heads turn to see, as give a glanced look, wondering of what new body and experiences had entered the shop.

Indeed, all eyes were focused when Lysaila walked into the shop, she being an Anthropic, the essence of science and government deciding to enhance the human race by blending people with animalistic physical traits. The nightly news programs on CNN, Fox, and other networks, have shown the more normal population what others have chosen to become to fancy their lusts or grant them a new vocation.

Lysaila was a call-girl, a dancer, as well she had sold her soul to Professor Haun, a renown scientist. The Professor was well known for his Reformation process, he able to cause minor or drastic changes to a person and their body. Many at the shop had read about Professor Haun and his partner, a Professor Beaker, their original claims of fame came via the Dartmoor Pony society. Professor Haun had some eight to ten years hence procured various people, those down on their luck, divorcees, orphans, and government criminals, the evil people that equally evil governments wished to be rid of, but not leaving any stray bodies for human right groups to dig up.

Many customers in the shop if asked would remember the story told In major magazines, of a college student named Daniel, and his being the primary test subject in an experiment sponsored in part by the Dartmoor Society. Reformation serum, Professor Haun, and Daniel worked together, as caused a young man human to become a prime, pedigree, stallion, Dartmoor breed pony animal. The story was a blockbuster, giving views about Daniel when he was as all a pony animal, he became the herd-sire stud to a pony farm based in Great Britain.

Lysaila was not that important of a personage, although due to her letting Professor Beaker apply the Reformation serum to her body, she became a rare breed of Anthropic design, she as part Sheep, and in part still a beautiful face she being a voluptuous woman. Scantly dressed, her sheep wool used by her to cover various body parts, while wearing moderate clothing.

Big blue eyes took a checked look around the shop before Lysaila dared to smile.
155.title: Someone Different

info.brief_description: A coffeehouse with a little secret among its patrons. Spend a day in someone's shoes.
info.description:
Welcome to the coffeehouse Someone Else's Shoes, where you can spend a day in someone else's shoes!

Are you confused? Well, allow me to explain. It's the year 2042. Technology has advanced exponentially in the last thirty years but as we grew scientifically, we lost some important things along the way. Art, democracy, freedoms...Since the new government took over ten years ago we've been forced to live bland lives. Everyone works without a smile; there's no joy in anyone's life, no hidden pleasure, no fantasies, no life.

That's where I came up with a fun little idea. Since everyone seems to think the grass is always greener on the other side, I established an underground café that let's anyone live a day in someone else's shoes! Thus Someone Else's Shoes became the trade name, using a special blend of coffee you can become anyone you desire. Of course, such activities are illegal in the eyes of the law (identity theft and such) and since I had no desire to harbor crime in my coffeehouse, there are several rules that remain in effect at all times. These rules also protect people's identities and encourage friendships plus communication!

Someone Else's Shoes House Rules:
1. No one may leave the house while transformed.
2. You may not ask who someone's true identity is while in the house.
3. Helping someone will earn you a free coffee.

Aside from that...Sit back and enjoy your stay. Socialize and use your time as someone else wisely!

~Ann, Proprietor of Someone Else's Shoes.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey guys, this is a serious/fun story I decided to work on. Please, feel free to have fun with it and take it places. Just be sure to keep the story within the house rules listed beforehand at all times. That's the point of the story.

Anyway, thanks for reading and I hope you add some interesting chapters.
